thread.title: Watch: AOA Has A Fun Time Trying Out Magic Tricks And Detective Skills In MV Making Film
thread.title_full: Watch: AOA Has A Fun Time Trying Out Magic Tricks And Detective Skills In MV Making Film

author: notclaira
title: Watch: AOA Has A Fun Time Trying Out Magic Tricks And Detective Skills In MV Making Film
text:
Pin   
After making their comeback on January 2 with epic music videos for their double title tracks “Excuse Me” and “Bing Bing,” AOA has unveiled the making film behind their music video shoot. 
In “Bing Bing,” the girls combine their trademark sexy concept with stage magic, complete with card tricks, hat tricks, and escape artistry. The reality is a little less glamorous as the girls struggle with wayward pigeons, awkward card movements, and filming underwater. 
The behind-the-scenes video of “Excuse Me” is equally cute, featuring a greeting from special guest Kwak Dong Yeon , who appeared in the music video as the mystery man that AOA is tracking down. 
Watch the making film below!
